scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-server && npm run build-client-dev
scripts.build-server: npm run build-ts-server && npm run tslint-server
scripts.build-client: webpack --config client/webpack.config.js && npm run build-client-styles && npm run tslint-client && npm run copy-static
scripts.build-client-dev: webpack --config client/webpack.config-dev.js && npm run build-client-styles-dev && npm run tslint-client && npm run copy-static
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p server/dist/static && cp -rf client/dist/. server/dist/static/client && cp -rf server/images/. server/dist/static/images
scripts.clean: npm run clean-server && npm run clean-client && npm run clean-tests
